name: Kurozu
description:
Kurozu is a throwback to early first-person shooters from the 90’s. The goal is to capture the excitement of fast, skillful movement and challenging gameplay while blending elements from the modern-day shooter to enhance that experience. Kurozu also emulates a post-apocalyptic visual and atmospheric style as well. Fight your way through three levels of monstrous and gory creatures! Don't forget to find all the secrets with our new Co-Op Campaign mode!

Xbox One or 360 Controller(s) required for multiplayer

1-4 Players supported

Player 1 uses mouse/keyboard
Players 1-4 use controllers

Features:
-------------------------------------------

    *Single Player Campaign
    *2-4 Player Co-Op Campaign
    *3 Full Demo Levels
    *Multiple Enemy and Boss AI
    *Multiplayer Deathmatch Mode
    *1-4 Player Splitscreen
    *Higher Difficulty Bots
    *8 Weapons
    *2  Weapon Upgrade
    *4 Powerups
    *Arena Announcer SFX
    ...and many more!
